const MC2String &  tokenStr,
const ClientSetting *  clientSetting,
bool  sendChange = true,
bool  allGroups = false,
bool  deleteHotTokens = false
) 
 

Removes all tokens but tokenStr.

Parameters:
user The user to change.
tokenStr The token to keep.
sendChange If to send change to db, default true.
allGroups If to remove from all groups not just the one for the ClientSetting.
deleteHotTokens If to remove tokens even if they are still hot, very newly created.
Returns:
0 If ok, -1 if error, -2 if timeout.
